attributes.action: penalise tax evaders who are on benefits whilst trading as a business on internet auction sites.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: I think that tax evaders should have all their benefits halted indefinately, whilst trading as businesses on internet auction sites. These people are not contributing to the state via tax or national insurance they are bleeding the country dry, claiming every benefit that is available.Many of these people have never worked in their life, there should be a maximum of 1 years on benefits and off to work like the rest of us.
